title: Coffee consumption in the U.S. 2013/14 - 2018/19
summary: The statistic shows a forecast for the U.S. caused by Coffee consumption in U.S. from 2013/2014 to 2018/2019 .
In the Year 2018/2019 , Coffee consumption U.S. of is estimated to reach 26.5 60-kilogram bags .
gold: Coffee consumption in the United States amounted to nearly 26.5 million 60-kilogram bags in the 2018/2019 fiscal year.
This is an increase from the total U.S. coffee consumption in the previous fiscal year , at 25.84 million 60-kilogram bags in the United States.
Coffee production The coffee plant has its origins in Ethiopia and is now grown all over the world .
